title: 火山引擎TTS调用没有指定sample rate，导致采样率不匹配，声音发到客户端后失真
body: 火山引擎TTS的sample rate默认是24000，小智协议默认的是16000，两者不匹配导致客户端受到声音播放的时候失真
author: yijunwu

comments.body: 需要在VolcengineTtsService.sendRequest方法中audio下添加rate参数，设为16000
最新代码已经修改了，20分钟前刚提交的，我也刚发现

satisfaction_conditions: A solution that addresses the sample rate mismatch between Volcano Engine TTS and the client protocol
Confirmation that the sample rate parameter has been properly configured
Timely resolution of the audio distortion problem
